## IProofService.verifyProof() method

Verification of zkp proof for given circuit id

**Signature:**

```typescript
verifyProof(zkp: ZKProof, circuitName: CircuitId): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  zkp | ZKProof | proof to verify |
|  circuitName | [CircuitId](./polygonid-js-sdk.circuitid.md) |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

`{Promise<boolean>}`
